TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit HttpWebClientProtocol extends System.Web.Services.Protocols.WebClientProtocol
Public MustInherit Class HttpWebClientProtocol Inherits WebClientProtocol

summary.span: 表示所有使用 HTTP 传输协议的 XML Web services 客户端代理的基类。

span.span: Represents the base class for all XML Web service client proxies that use the HTTP transport protocol.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类的属性用于控制用于传输的 XML Web 服务请求和响应的 HTTP 请求对象的行为。The properties on this class are used to control the behavior of the HTTP request object used to transmit the XML Web service request and response. 属性将映射到属性上找到。The properties map to properties found on . 若要与 XML Web 服务使用 HTTP 进行通信，必须创建代理类间接或直接派生自XML Web 服务。To communicate with an XML Web service using HTTP, you must create a proxy class deriving indirectly or directly from for the XML Web service. 而不是手动创建代理类，可以使用 Wsdl.exe 工具创建代理类为给定的 XML Web 服务的服务说明。Instead of creating the proxy class manually, you can use the Wsdl.exe tool to create a proxy class for a given XML Web service's service description. 由于 httpwebclientprotocol 派生是所有代理类的基类，其属性是在代理类。Since HttpWebClientProtocol is the base class for all proxy classes, its properties are on your proxy classes. 这些属性可用于控制基础传输的请求行为。These properties are useful for controlling the request behavior of the underlying transport. 例如，使用调用 XML Web services 通过防火墙的属性。For example, use the property for calling XML Web services through a firewall. 许多这些属性用于初始化发出 Web 请求。Many of these properties are used to initialize the that makes the Web request. ，并直接或间接派生提供支持 SOAP、 HTTP-GET 和 HTTP-POST 分别。, , and derive directly or indirectly from to provide support for SOAP, HTTP-GET and HTTP-POST respectively. ## Examples 下面的示例是名为 XML Web 服务调用一个 ASP.NET Web 窗体`Math`。The following example is an ASP.NET Web Form, which calls an XML Web service named `Math`. 在`EnterBtn_Click`函数中，Web 窗体允许自动将客户端重定向到其他站点的服务器。Within the `EnterBtn_Click` function, the Web Form allows the server to automatically redirect the client to other sites. 它还设置客户端身份验证凭据、 代理设置、 的请求编码和的请求的超时时间之前调用 XML Web 服务方法。It also sets client authentication credentials, proxy settings, the request encoding and the time out for the request before calling the XML Web service method. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HttpWebClientProtocol Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpWebClientProtocol Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HttpWebClientProtocol Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpWebClientProtocol Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

threadsafe.span: 此类的属性复制到的新实例为每个 XML Web 服务方法调用的对象。

span.span: The properties on this class are copied into a new instance of a object for each XML Web service method call.

threadsafe.span: 虽然你可以在同一个调用 XML Web 服务方法实例同时在不同的线程，从没有同步可确保一致的快照的属性获取传输到对象。

span.span: While you can call XML Web service methods on the same instance from different threads at the same time, there is no synchronization done to ensure that a consistent snapshot of the properties gets transferred to the object.

threadsafe.span: 因此，如果您需要修改属性并进行并发的方法调用来自不同线程应使用不同的实例的 XML Web 服务代理，或提供你自己的同步。

span.span: Therefore, if you need to modify the properties and make concurrent method calls from different threads you should use a different instance of the XML Web service proxy or provide your own synchronization.

summary.span: 获取或设置客户端是否自动跟随服务器重定向。

span.span: Gets or sets whether the client automatically follows server redirects.

value.span: 则自动将客户端重定向以跟随服务器重定向；否则为 。

span.span: to automatically redirect the client to follow server redirects; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果客户端发送身份验证信息，如用户名和密码，您不想要启用服务器重定向，因为这可能损害安全性。If a client sends authentication information, such as a user name and password, you do not want to enable the server to redirect, because this can compromise security. 一个如果将引发属性是`false`和 Web 服务器尝试将请求重定向。A is thrown if the property is `false` and the Web server attempts to redirect the request. 属性包含对象，其中同时和属性反映了有关尝试重定向的详细信息。The property contains an object, where both the and properties reflect details regarding the attempted redirect. 属性包含等效于 HTTP 重定向状态代码 （301、 302 和 307） 和`Location`标头内的集合指向请求尝试重定向到的 URI。The property contains an equivalent to one of the HTTP redirect status codes (301, 302, and 307) and the `Location` header within the collection points to the URI that the request attempted to be redirected to.

exception.span: 属性为 并且 Web 服务器尝试将请求重定向。

span.span: The property is and the Web server attempts to redirect the request.

span.span: Cancels an asynchronous call to an XML Web service method, unless the call has already completed.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection ClientCertificates { get; }
.property instance class System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection ClientCertificates
Public ReadOnly Property ClientCertificates As X509CertificateCollection

public: property System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509CertificateCollection ^ ClientCertificates { System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509CertificateCollection ^ get(); };
member this.ClientCertificates : System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection

span.span: Gets the collection of client certificates.
An that represents the client certificates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性允许客户端调用 XML Web 服务方法时将传递一个或多个客户端证书，也称为 Authenticode X.509 v.3 证书。This property allows a client to pass one or more client certificates, also known as Authenticode X.509 v.3 certificates, when calling an XML Web service method. 如果 XML Web 服务方法已配置为使用客户端证书，客户端证书可以用作一种用于对客户端进行身份验证机制。If the XML Web service method has been configured to use client certificates, a client certificate can be used as one mechanism for authenticating a client. 设置客户端证书的详细信息，请参阅 Internet 信息服务 (IIS) 文档。For details on setting up client certificates, see the Internet Information Services (IIS) documentation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在客户端证书从文件中加载，然后将其添加到调用 XML Web 服务方法使用客户端证书进行身份验证的属性。The following code example demonstrates how to load in a client certificate from a file and then add it to the property for calling an XML Web service method that uses client certificates for authentication. [!code-csharp[HttpWebClientProtocol.ClientCertificates#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebClientProtocol.ClientCertificates/CS/certcs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[HttpWebClientProtocol.ClientCertificates#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebClientProtocol.ClientCertificates/VB/certvb.aspx#1)]

related.span: 保证使用 ASP.NET 创建的 XML Web services 的安全

span.span: Securing XML Web Services Created Using ASP.NET

.property instance class System.Net.CookieContainer CookieContainer

member this.CookieContainer : System.Net.CookieContainer with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 Cookie 集合。

span.span: Gets or sets the collection of cookies.

value.span: ，它表示 Web 服务客户端的 Cookie。

span.span: A that represents the cookies for a Web Services client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 XML Web 服务方法使用会话状态，然后传递 cookie 在响应标头中返回的 XML Web 服务客户端的唯一标识该 XML Web 服务客户端的会话。If an XML Web service method uses session state, then a cookie is passed back in the response headers to the XML Web service client that uniquely identifies the session for that XML Web service client. 为了使 XML Web 服务来维持会话状态的客户端，客户端必须存储在 cookie。In order for an XML Web service to maintain session state for a client, the client must store the cookie. 通过创建的新实例的客户端接收的 HTTP cookie并将分配给之前调用 XML Web 服务方法的代理类的属性。Clients receive the HTTP cookie by creating a new instance of and assigning that to the property of the proxy class before calling the XML Web service method. 如果需要来维持会话状态之外，代理类实例超出范围时，客户端必须存储到 XML Web 服务调用之间的 HTTP cookie。If you need to maintain session state beyond when the proxy class instance goes out of scope, the client must store the HTTP cookie between calls to the XML Web service. 例如，Web 窗体客户端可以通过保存存储的 HTTP cookie在其自己的会话状态中。For instance, a Web Forms client can store the HTTP cookie by saving the in its own session state. 因为并非所有的 XML Web services 使用会话状态，因此要求客户端不始终使用的客户端代理属性，该 XML Web 服务的文档必须声明是否使用会话状态。Because not all XML Web services use session state and thus clients are not always required to use the property of a client proxy, the documentation for the XML Web service must state whether session state is used. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是使用会话状态的 XML Web 服务的 Web 窗体客户端。The following code example is a Web Forms client of an XML Web service that uses session state. 客户端将存储中唯一标识的会话通过将其存储在客户端的会话状态中的 HTTP cookie。The client stores the HTTP cookie that uniquely identifies the session by storing it in the client's session state. [!code-aspx-csharp[HttpWebClientProtocol.CookieContainer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebClientProtocol.CookieContainer/CS/serverusageclientcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HttpWebClientProtocol.CookieContainer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebClientProtocol.CookieContainer/VB/serverusageclientvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用于通过防火墙进行 XML Web services 请求的代理信息。

span.span: Gets or sets proxy information for making an XML Web service request through a firewall.

value.span: 一个 ，它包含通过防火墙进行请求的代理信息。

span.span: An that contains the proxy information for making requests through a firewall.

value.span: 默认值为操作系统代理设置。

span.span: The default value is the operating system proxy settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用如果客户端需要使用不同的代理设置中的系统设置的属性。Use the property if a client needs to use different proxy settings than those in the system settings. 使用类来设置代理设置，因为它实现了。Use the class to set the proxy settings, because it implements . 可以在配置文件中设置默认代理设置。Default proxy settings can be set in a configuration file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[配置 Internet 应用程序](~/docs/framework/network-programming/configuring-internet-applications.md)。For details, see [Configuring Internet Applications](~/docs/framework/network-programming/configuring-internet-applications.md). ## Examples 下面的示例设置在调用之前的以下代理设置`Math`XML Web 服务： 代理服务器与http://proxyserver，80 和到代理服务器进行本地地址绕过代理服务器端口。The following example sets the following proxy settings prior to invoking the `Math` XML Web service: the proxy server to http://proxyserver, the proxy port to 80 and the bypass to the proxy server for local addresses. [!code-cpp[Classic HttpWebClientProtocol.Proxy Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpWebClientProtocol.Proxy Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic HttpWebClientProtocol.Proxy Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpWebClientProtocol.Proxy Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpWebClientProtocol.Proxy Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpWebClientProtocol.Proxy Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The value of the HTTP protocol user agent header.

value.span: 默认为“MS Web Services Client Protocol ”，其中 为公共语言运行时的版本（例如 1.0.3705.0）。

span.span: The default is "MS Web Services Client Protocol ", where is the version of the common language runtime (for example, 1.0.3705.0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户代理字符串允许 Web 服务器来确定客户端。The user agent string allows a Web server to identify the client. ## Examples [!code-cpp[HttpWebClientProtocol_UserAgent#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebClientProtocol_UserAgent/CPP/httpwebclientprotocol_useragent.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[HttpWebClientProtocol_UserAgent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebClientProtocol_UserAgent/CS/httpwebclientprotocol_useragent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[HttpWebClientProtocol_UserAgent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebClientProtocol_UserAgent/VB/httpwebclientprotocol_useragent.vb#1)]
